channel.title: college on AMKS
channel.description: Recent content in college on AMKS

item.title: Summer 2020 Retrospective
item.description: Here’s a quick summary of what I did last summer! Education I took CS70: Discrete Math and Probability Theory, a class I really enjoyed! I think that taking the class in the summer was challenging and forced me to really consider what I wanted to spend time doing –– making tough decisions about attending discussions, lectures and so on. I also took CS375: Teaching Techniques for Computer Science, a discussion-based class for first-time teachers.
